title: 8-bit Digital Watch Face
summary: get oldskool with your Android Wear, C64, ZX Spectrum, DOS fonts and more
description: for all nostalgic tradicionalists and (big) pixel lovers, here comes simple watchface, which resurrects font from traditional computers and systems and other low resolution fonts -> for your pleasurefont-list:- C64- ZX Spectrum- DOS- 4x3- 4x5- 4x6- 6x5For free - for you - enjoy these in their pixel glory on your wrist.
descriptionHTML:
for all nostalgic tradicionalists and (big) pixel lovers, here comes simple watchface, which resurrects font from traditional computers and systems and other low resolution fonts -> for your pleasure

font-list:

- C64
- ZX Spectrum
- DOS
- 4x3
- 4x5
- 4x6
- 6x5

For free - for you - enjoy these in their pixel glory on your wrist.
comments: Clean and simple Great watch face. When my watch screen goes into low power mode the font gets larger and is pushed up and off the screen if I get a notification. It would be good to have a setting to stop the font size changing
Not syncing Not appearing on watch or app
